definition: exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

sentences.english: The ticking sound helped him sleep well.
sentences.chinese: 表针的滴答声有利于他的睡眠。

sentences.english: Every time you lie the hands on your clock will move.
sentences.chinese: 你每次撒谎，你钟上的表针将移动一次。

sentences.english: The hands on his clock do not move.
Pump operating normally, the power is then reverse hands.
sentences.chinese: 电泵运行正常，电源正接反接表针。

sentences.english: Within seconds the meter hand should read zero.
sentences.chinese: 在几秒钟内，表针的读数应为零。

sentences.english: A meter needle attached to the coil enables the position of the coil to be observed.
sentences.chinese: 固定在线圈上的表针使人们能观察到线圈的位置。

sentences.english: Tell me what the two hands say.
sentences.chinese: 告诉我两个表针代表着什么。

definition: pointer on a gauge/clock hand/cursor/(computing) pointer
variant of 表盤|表盘[biao3 pan2]/watch face
balance (of a watch or clock)/balance wheel
dial or meter for displaying speed, time, or other measurements/cyclocomputer/code table (computing)
